title: Buyer web portal (Pttor)
description: Delivery of electronic document data resulting from the sale service of oil via Fleet Card through an EDC card reader to the Revenue Department at a gas station service point

title: E-Tax
description: e-Tax Invoice and e-Receipt Platform This also provides services to KBANK, BAY, PCC, RBH, BBL, issuing electronic documents and confirming documents with electronic signatures,

title: S-Leasing
description: Download tax invoices and electronic receipts

title: SaypayPOS
description: SayPays POS Point of Sale (POS) system for small to medium-sized businesses, where the software handles overall store management.

title: Plant Redcross
description: The campaign encourages people to plant green forests in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Thai Scouts, offering gifts to the land by uploading images and messages related to tree planting.
